data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Andre Ayew (Swansea) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 25, Goal! Swansea take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Ben Cabango.
At Liberty Stadium, Jake Bidwell has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The first half has been concluded at Liberty Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Liberty Stadium.
Ben Cabango (Swansea) gets a yellow card.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's first substitution at Liberty Stadium with Sam Gallagher replacing Ben Brereton.
In the minute 61, It's now 2-0 in Swansea as Andre Ayew scores for Swansea.
The away team have replaced Corry Evans with Tyrhys Dolan. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
The home team replace Jamal Lowe with Viktor Gyokeres.
In the minute 75, Kasey Palmer is replacing Yan Dhanda for Swansea at Liberty Stadium.
Jacob Davenport is replacing Adam Armstrong for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
